data_table.description: Subject ID, sample ID, and sample use variable obtained from participants with malignant peripheral nerve sheath tumors and involved in the "Oncogenomics of Malignant Peripheral Nerve Sheath Tumors" project.

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample use. Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Seq_DNA_WholeExome: Whole exome sequencing; Seq_RNA: Whole transcriptome sequencing
